YoutubeMetadata.author: MCB3
YoutubeMetadata.title: CB 3 Manhattan - SLA \u0026 DCA Licensing Committee - August 17th 2020
YoutubeMetadata.shortDescription:
Agenda
1.    Approval of previous month's minutes
2.    Amend administrative approval stipulations to require one year of operation before applying for an upgrade
New Liquor License Applications
3.    Bel-Fries Foods LLC, 132 Ludlow St (b)
4.    The Bronx Brewery LLC, 64 2nd Ave (op)
5.    Cenoté (Merse Group LLC), 109 Ludlow St (op) (withdrawn before meeting)
6.    Ten Degrees (241 On St Marks Corp), 121 St Marks Pl (op)
7.    Dinah Restaurant (Dinah Corporation), 162-166 2nd Ave (op)
8.    Avenue A Gourmet LLC, 202 Ave A (op) (withdrawn before meeting)
9.    Corp to be Formed, 511 E 5th St (op)
Items not heard at Committee
10.    The Ground (Chinatown United Food Services LLC), 130 Madison St (wb)
11.    Lhasa (Lhasa Fast Food LLC), 177 1st Ave (wb)
12.    Global Nippa USA Inc, 239-241 E 5th St (wb)
13.    Clandestino Cafe & Bar (35 Canal Cafe LLC), 35 Canal St (op/corp change) (withdrawn before meeting)
14.    Vote to adjourn
